name: AENTITY
description: AENTITY challenges you as an artist. Leaving my mind behind, the contours of the ego blur. Past the dream wall are no rules to break, there are playful moves to make, veiled visions to wake, unseen pictures to take.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 or AMD A8-6500 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon R7 260 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
